questions.question: Show me all logon events
questions.description: Displays all logon events, including interactive, network, and service logons.

summary_template.title: Summary of All Logon Events
content: Total Events: {total} logon events detected between {start_time} and {end_time}.
Users Involved: The primary users involved were {users}.
Time of Events: Most logons occurred between {peak_hours}. However, there were unusual logon attempts from {suspicious_users} at {suspicious_hours}.
Notable IPs: Logon attempts were made from the following IP addresses: {ip_addresses}.
Potential Security Concerns: {suspicious_users} logged in from unfamiliar IP addresses, which could indicate potential unauthorized access.
detailed_analysis: Review these logon events for any unusual patterns, such as failed logon attempts followed by successful logons. Pay attention to logons from accounts that normally do not have remote access.
Correlate these logon events with concurrent changes in user privileges, as attackers often escalate privileges after gaining access.
Investigate the logon attempts during off-hours, particularly those by {suspicious_users}, as these could be indicators of compromised accounts.
suggestions: Show me failed logon attempts
Show me logon events outside business hours
Show me recent changes in user privileges
Show me lateral movement attempts

questions.question: Show me all logoff events
questions.description: Displays all logoff events, including interactive and remote logoffs.

summary_template.title: Summary of All Logoff Events
content: Total Events: {total} logoff events detected between {start_time} and {end_time}.
Users Involved: The primary users logging off were {users}.
Time of Events: The majority of logoffs occurred between {peak_hours}, aligning with normal user activity patterns.
Unusual Logoff Activity: Logoff events by {suspicious_users} during {suspicious_hours} may indicate an attempt to cover tracks after unauthorized access.
detailed_analysis: Correlate these logoff events with prior logon events and any changes made during the session. Identify any suspicious file deletions or system modifications.
Investigate logoffs that occur immediately after administrative activities or installation of services, as these could be attempts to hide malicious activity.
Check if there is a pattern of frequent logoffs from a specific user, which may indicate that the account is compromised.
suggestions: Show me file deletions after logoff events
Show me service installations before logoff
Show me network traffic before logoff events
Show me recent logon attempts before logoff

questions.question: Show me all service logon events
questions.description: Displays all service logon events, indicating when services log on to the system.

summary_template.title: Summary of Service Logon Events
content: Total Events: {total} service logon events detected between {start_time} and {end_time}.
Services Involved: The primary services involved were {services}.
Time of Events: Most service logons occurred between {peak_hours}.
Potential Security Concerns: Unusual service logons from {suspicious_services} during {suspicious_hours}.
detailed_analysis: Investigate service logons that occur during off-hours or involve services that do not typically log on.
Correlate these logons with changes in service configurations or installations to detect unauthorized activities.
Review service logons from accounts that normally do not perform service-related tasks.
suggestions: Show me service logons outside business hours
Show me recent service installations
Show me changes in service configurations

questions.question: Show me all network logon events
questions.description: Displays all network logon events, including remote logons and domain authentications.

summary_template.title: Summary of Network Logon Events
content: Total Events: {total} network logon events detected between {start_time} and {end_time}.
Users Involved: The primary users involved were {users}.
Time of Events: Most network logons occurred between {peak_hours}.
Potential Security Concerns: Unusual network logons from {suspicious_users} at {suspicious_hours}.
detailed_analysis: Review network logon events for signs of lateral movement or unauthorized remote access.
Correlate these logon events with network traffic to detect data exfiltration or C2 communication.
Investigate network logons from unusual IP addresses or domains.
suggestions: Show me remote logon attempts
Show me network traffic associated with logons
Show me logons from unusual IP addresses

summary_template.title: Summary of Failed Logon Events
content: Total Events: {total} failed logon events detected between {start_time} and {end_time}.
Users Involved: The primary users involved in failed logons were {users}.
Time of Events: Most failed logons occurred between {peak_hours}.
Potential Security Concerns: Repeated failed logons from {suspicious_users} during {suspicious_hours}.
detailed_analysis: Review failed logon attempts to identify potential brute-force attacks or unauthorized access.
Correlate these events with successful logons to detect privilege escalation.
Investigate accounts with a high number of failed logon attempts.
suggestions: Show me accounts with repeated failed logons
Show me successful logons after failed attempts
Show me failed logons from unusual IP addresses
